title: Sam Drivers 14.9 -=TEAM OS-={HKRG}
description:
[B]SamDrivers 14.9[/B]


[B]Title: SamDrivers 
Program Version: 14.9 
Publication Type: Drivers with automatic installation 
Language: MULTi / Russian 
Treatment: Not required - Free set 
System requirements: 

The presence of a pair of gigabytes of free space on the system hard drive to unpack temporary files 
Description: 
Collection of drivers from SamLab.ws for all 32-bit and 64-bit Windows operating systems from Windows 2000 to Windows 8.1 Update 2, including server platforms. 
As the shell-installer to auto-detect your hardware and automatically install the necessary drivers use special programs: 
DriverPack Solution 14.9 Revision 419 / Drivers Installer Assistant 6.4.28 / Snappy Driver Installer 0.2.133 / DriverX 3.05 + wrapper for the backup drivers Drivers Backup Solution 3.90.21 
The collection includes the most current drivers on the release date collected personally SamLab. Do not confuse this package with the driver-packs of Bashrat'a - these drivers are newer and more stable. 
SamLab long been a member of the team Bashrat has the ability to know about all the problems of a similar driver packs to create its own set of the most comprehensive and peaceful! 
Drivers for touchpads and other input devices of the driver packs DP_Touchpad_HHH installed only under the personal supervision and only in the shell DPS 
All of these devices have the same ID - controls what put us on the touchpad in the name of the pack and notebook vendor in the name of the folder with drivers 
Still the same identifiers are found in the drivers for sound cards and tuners - install only drivers, which company your device 
In compiling the package were used: 
1 Shell to install drivers from Snappy Driver Installer BadPointer 
2 Shell to install drivers from the Drivers Installer Assistant Romeo91 
3 Shell to install drivers DriverPack Solution from BadPointer and ArtX 
4 Shell to backup drivers Drivers Backup Solution from Romeo91 
5 For help in creating driver packs to thank: mr_smartepants, QuarQ, lisabon 
6 driver packs for SamDrivers originally created in conjunction with the team DriverPacks.net 
Included in the collection of driver packs:
